songs.title: Time Passes By
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh-oh
Doo doo doo doo doo
Doo doo doo doo doo doo

Doo doo doo doo

[Verse 1]
Iʼm sitting here alone again
Waiting for you to come see me now
As time passes by
In the blink of an eye
I know Iʼll get to see you somehow

You are sitting home another night
Waiting for someone to hold you tight
Time passes by
So quick indeed
This time youʼre slipping away from me

Itʼs been a long, cold, hard winter
It was a long, drawn-out spring
You took no wrong when you saw nothing in me
But our love was something nice to see

[Verse 2]
We were sitting alone on the beach
Letting all the sand between our feet
As time passes by
Blink of an eye
Amazing how things ainʼt what they used to be
Ainʼt what they used to be...

It was the shortest summer
The fall was so abrupt
Thought youʼd be happy with the way things were
But I guess it wasnʼt enough

[Verse 3]
I am outside sitting, writing this song
You could have guessed that all along
Time passed me by
So quick indeed
And youʼre the only thing that Iʼm missing

I wrote this song all last night
Tried to make the lyrics fit just right
But Iʼm still having trouble with this very last part
But I know itʼll come from my heart
But I know itʼll come from my heart...

[Outro]
Doo doo doo doo doo doo doo doo doo
